item.description:
Friday 2/11/11 at our Boston Location:
You don't have to be a member to celebrate with us...

Lights go out at 7pm and the party goes until close!


  • Free pizza
  • DJ spinning tunes 7-midnight
  • Headlamp climbing- bring your own or borrow one provided by Petzl- FREE!
  • Glowing black light bouldering- with even more glowing features than ever before!
  • Raffles
  • Prizes
  • Beer garden (21+ only)




Tickets:
Members Just $5!
Non-members $15 w/own gear $20 includes gear rental
21+ entrance to beer garden $5



This party is to thank everyone who has ever climbed at Rock Spot Climbing since we opened, for supporting a local business, a growing sport, and for generally being awesome! You can also check out our new Ping Pong table with free play all night!

Oh, and did I mention that ALL PROCEEDS BENEFIT THE RUMNEY CLIMBERS ASSOCIATION AND THE WESTERN MASS CLIMBERS COALITION! Yup, all you cool climbers are going to party together to help ensure safe and legal access to climbing for the entire community.

Tickets may be purchased at the front desk at either location, or via phone. Advanced ticket sales include a free raffle ticket.

ALL PROCEEDS BENEFIT THE RUMNEY CLIMBERS ASSOCIATION AND WESTERN MASS CLIMBERS COALITION!
item.name: Rock Spot Party!
